parameters.name: Notification
parameters.description: The notification settings. For information about the asynchronous notification format, see [Asynchronous message examples](~~2743997~~).

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The custom tags. You can search for or filter asynchronous tasks by custom tag.

parameters.name: UserData
parameters.description: The custom information, which is returned in an asynchronous notification and facilitates notification management. The maximum length of the value is 2,048 bytes.
